info.title: Windsurf World Tour Stats API
info.description: API for PWA and IWT windsurf wave competition data (2016-2025)

get.description: Get basic API information and available endpoints
Check API and database health status
Get a paginated list of windsurf competition events with optional filters
Retrieve a single event by its database ID
Get comprehensive statistics for a specific event including best scores, move type analysis, and top scores tables
Get list of all athletes who competed in a specific event for a specific division
Get comprehensive statistics for a specific athlete in a specific event

parameters.name: sex

schema.description: Gender division filter ('Women' or 'Men', optional - auto-detect)
schema.title: Sex

parameters.description: Gender division filter ('Women' or 'Men', optional - auto-detect)

get.description: Get paginated list of athletes with career statistics (wins, podiums, events competed)

get.summary: List competition results with athlete details
get.description: Get paginated list of competition results enriched with athlete profiles and event information
Get career statistics for a specific athlete
Retrieve aggregated statistics across all windsurf event data from SITE_STATS_VIEW

get.summary: Compare two athletes in an event
get.description: Get head-to-head statistics comparing two athletes' performance in a specific event

AthleteHeadToHeadStats.title: AthleteHeadToHeadStats
AthleteHeadToHeadStats.description: Statistics for a single athlete in head-to-head comparison

AthleteListItem.title: AthleteListItem
AthleteListItem.description:
Athlete summary for event athlete list

Used in dropdown selector for athlete stats tab.

total_athletes.title: Total Athletes
total_athletes.description: Total number of athletes in response

AthleteListResponse.title: AthleteListResponse
AthleteListResponse.description:
Event athlete list response

Contains all athletes who competed in a specific event and division.

AthleteProfile.title: AthleteProfile
AthleteProfile.description: Athlete profile information for stats detail view

AthleteResult.title: AthleteResult
AthleteResult.description:
Athlete competition result model

Single result from a competition with athlete and event details.

total_heats.title: Total Heats
total_heats.description: Total number of heats competed in

move_type_scores.title: Move Type Scores
move_type_scores.description: Move type analysis (sorted by best_score DESC)

heat_scores.title: Heat Scores
heat_scores.description: All heat scores (sorted by score DESC)

jump_scores.title: Jump Scores
jump_scores.description: All jump scores (sorted by score DESC)

wave_scores.title: Wave Scores
wave_scores.description: All wave scores (sorted by score DESC)

AthleteStatsResponse.title: AthleteStatsResponse
AthleteStatsResponse.description:
Detailed athlete statistics for event

Complete performance statistics for a specific athlete in a specific event.

profile.name: Daida Ruano Moreno
profile.sponsors: Bruch Boards, Severne Windsurfing, Maui Ultra Fins

AthleteSummary.title: AthleteSummary
AthleteSummary.description:
Athlete career summary model

Aggregated career statistics for a single athlete.

best_heat_score.description: Best overall heat score with context

best_jump_score.description: Best individual jump score with context

best_wave_score.description: Best individual wave score with context

AthleteSummaryStats.title: AthleteSummaryStats
AthleteSummaryStats.description: Summary statistics for athlete in event

opponents.title: Opponents
opponents.description: List of opponent names in that heat

breakdown.description: Breakdown of counting scores (top 2 waves + top 2 jumps)

move.title: Move
move.description: Move type name (decoded from codes like B, F, P)

opponents.title: Opponents
opponents.description: List of opponent names in that heat

has_multiple_tied.title: Has Multiple Tied
has_multiple_tied.description: True if athlete has multiple jumps with same best score

all_tied_scores.title: All Tied Scores
all_tied_scores.description: All tied jump scores if multiple

BestScoredBy.title: BestScoredBy
BestScoredBy.description:
Information about who scored the best for a move type

Used in MoveTypeStat to indicate the athlete who achieved the best score.

opponents.title: Opponents
opponents.description: List of opponent names in that heat

has_multiple_tied.title: Has Multiple Tied
has_multiple_tied.description: True if athlete has multiple waves with same best score

all_tied_scores.title: All Tied Scores
all_tied_scores.description: All tied wave scores if multiple

BreakdownScore.title: BreakdownScore
BreakdownScore.description: Individual score in a heat breakdown (wave or jump)

winner.title: Winner
winner.description: Which athlete won this metric ('athlete1', 'athlete2', or 'tie')

ComparisonMetric.title: ComparisonMetric
ComparisonMetric.description: Single comparison metric between two athletes

total_athletes.title: Total Athletes
total_athletes.description: Total unique athletes who competed in event

Event.title: Event
Event.description:
Event response model

Represents a single PWA/IWT windsurf competition event.

EventStatsMetadata.title: EventStatsMetadata
EventStatsMetadata.description:
Event statistics metadata

Metadata about the event statistics data.

move_type_stats.title: Move Type Stats
move_type_stats.description: Move type statistics (sorted by best_score DESC)

EventStatsResponse.title: EventStatsResponse
EventStatsResponse.description:
Event statistics response

Complete event statistics including summary, move type analysis, and top scores.

EventsResponse.title: EventsResponse
EventsResponse.description:
Paginated events list response

Contains events data and pagination metadata.

comparison.description: Comparison metrics with winners and differences

HealthResponse.title: HealthResponse
HealthResponse.description:
Health check response

Provides API and database health status.

HeatScoreBreakdown.title: HeatScoreBreakdown
HeatScoreBreakdown.description:
Breakdown of counting scores for a best heat score

Shows the top 2 counting waves and top 2 counting jumps that contributed to the heat total.

heat_number.title: Heat Number
heat_number.description: Heat identifier where jump was performed

move.title: Move
move.description: Move type performed (decoded from codes like B, F, P)

counting.title: Counting
counting.description: Whether this score counted toward heat total

has_multiple_tied.title: Has Multiple Tied
has_multiple_tied.description: True if multiple athletes are tied for this best score

all_tied_scores.title: All Tied Scores
all_tied_scores.description: All jump scores tied for this best score (if multiple)

JumpScoreDetail.title: JumpScoreDetail
JumpScoreDetail.description:
Jump score detail with move type

Extends ScoreDetail with move type information for jump scores.

athlete_id.title: Athlete Id
athlete_id.description: Unified athlete ID (for navigation to athlete profile)

JumpScoreEntry.title: JumpScoreEntry
JumpScoreEntry.description:
Jump score table entry

Extends ScoreEntry with move type for jump scores.

best_score.title: Best Score
best_score.description: Best score achieved for this move type

average_score.title: Average Score
average_score.description: Average score for this move type

fleet_average.title: Fleet Average
fleet_average.description: Fleet average score for this move type (counting scores only)

fleet_best.title: Fleet Best
fleet_best.description: Fleet best score for this move type (counting scores only)

best_score.title: Best Score
best_score.description: Highest score for this move type

average_score.title: Average Score
average_score.description: Average score for this move type (rounded to 2 decimals)

MoveTypeStat.title: MoveTypeStat
MoveTypeStat.description:
Move type statistics

Aggregated statistics for a specific move type (e.g., Wave, Forward Loop).

has_next.title: Has Next
has_next.description: Whether there is a next page

has_prev.title: Has Prev
has_prev.description: Whether there is a previous page

PaginationMeta.title: PaginationMeta
PaginationMeta.description:
Pagination metadata

Provides information about pagination state.

best_heat_score.title: Best Heat Score
best_heat_score.description: Best heat score in this round

average_heat_score.title: Average Heat Score
average_heat_score.description: Average heat score in this round

best_jump_score.title: Best Jump Score
best_jump_score.description: Best jump score in this round

average_jump_score.title: Average Jump Score
average_jump_score.description: Average jump score in this round

best_wave_score.title: Best Wave Score
best_wave_score.description: Best wave score in this round

average_wave_score.title: Average Wave Score
average_wave_score.description: Average wave score in this round

total_heats.title: Total Heats
total_heats.description: Number of heats in this round

RoundStat.title: RoundStat
RoundStat.description:
Round statistics with best and average scores

Aggregated statistics for a specific round (e.g., Final, Semi-Finals).

breakdown.description: Breakdown of counting scores (top 2 waves + top 2 jumps)

has_multiple_tied.title: Has Multiple Tied
has_multiple_tied.description: True if multiple athletes are tied for this best score

all_tied_scores.title: All Tied Scores
all_tied_scores.description: All scores tied for this best score (if multiple)

ScoreDetail.title: ScoreDetail
ScoreDetail.description:
Score detail with athlete information

Base model for best scores in summary statistics.

athlete_id.title: Athlete Id
athlete_id.description: Unified athlete ID (for navigation to athlete profile)

ScoreEntry.title: ScoreEntry
ScoreEntry.description:
Score table entry

Single entry in the top scores tables with rank.

SiteStat.title: SiteStat
SiteStat.description:
Site statistic model

Single statistic from SITE_STATS_VIEW containing a metric name and value.

SiteStatsResponse.title: SiteStatsResponse
SiteStatsResponse.description:
Site statistics response

Contains all site-wide statistics from SITE_STATS_VIEW.

best_heat_score.description: Best overall heat score (includes tied scores if multiple)

best_jump_score.description: Best individual jump score (includes tied scores if multiple)

best_wave_score.description: Best individual wave score (includes tied scores if multiple)

SummaryStats.title: SummaryStats
SummaryStats.description:
Summary statistics

Best scores across all categories for an event.
Each best score object contains has_multiple_tied flag and all_tied_scores list if applicable.

TiedJumpScore.title: TiedJumpScore
TiedJumpScore.description: Tied jump score entry for an athlete (when they have multiple best jumps with same score)

TiedWaveScore.title: TiedWaveScore
TiedWaveScore.description: Tied wave score entry for an athlete (when they have multiple best waves with same score)

heat_number.title: Heat Number
heat_number.description: Heat identifier where wave was ridden

counting.title: Counting
counting.description: Whether this score counted toward heat total
